questions.text: What kind of school was Carla going to?
questions.explanation:
Traffic school.

	Carla got a speeding ticket and had to go to traffic school so she didn't lose her license. When she first said she had to go to school, they thought it was a regular school to further her education.

questions.text: What dishes did Sam like for everyday use?
questions.correct: the ones with the multicolored flowers
options: the ones with the animal prints
the one with the polka dots
questions.explanation:
the ones with the multicolored flowers.

	Diane didn't like them at all. Sam said he liked them because you could hide food you didn't like in the patterns.

questions.text: Who did Woody suggest jump out of the cake?
questions.explanation:
Diane & Chambers & Diane Chambers.

	The rest of the men thought it was a horrible idea since Diane was Sam's fiancee. However, Woody asked Diane and she ended up agreeing to do it.

questions.text: What was Sam freaking out about?
questions.correct: Being with only one woman for the rest of his life
options: Woody messed up an order for the bar
questions.explanation:
Being with only one woman for the rest of his life.

	Sam said he'd spend his life nibbling on one set of earlobes, an insensitive ones at that. Diane over heard everything and when she popped out of the cake she was quite angry.

questions.text: What did Diane give Sam 24 hours of?
questions.correct: Freedom to go out with any woman he wants
questions.explanation:
Freedom to go out with any woman he wants.

	She told him he could go on a "flesh binge". The agreement was that not only would he go out but she would do the same. They would sow their last wild oats.

questions.text: Who got back first, Sam or Diane?
questions.explanation:
Sam.

	Sam returned to Cheers a little before Diane and was anxious for her to return. He was also feeling a little angry.

questions.text: Why was Sam upset with Diane?
questions.correct: He thought she was with another man.
options: He couldn't get any work done until she returned to waitress.
He found out she was married once before.
questions.explanation:
He thought she was with another man.

	Sam said he was faithful to Diane because he loved her but she was out all night. He felt that she had betrayed him.

questions.text: How did Sam know that Diane didn't go home?
questions.correct: He watched her apartment from her car.
options: He had Cliff spy on her.
questions.explanation:
He watched her apartment from her car.

	He stayed out all night watching her apartment waiting for her to return. When he didn't see her he concluded she was out with another man.

questions.text: How did Diane know Sam took a nap?
questions.correct: She watched him watch her apartment.
options: She had Carla spy on Sam.
She walked up to his car and saw him sleeping.
She just took a guess and got lucky.
questions.explanation:
She watched him watch her apartment.

	She was up the street in her car watching Sam watch her apartment. Neither of them cheated on the other but neither really trusted the other one either.

questions.text: How many minutes did they have left at the end?
questions.explanation:
5.

	Diane said 5 minutes wasn't enough time to do anything. Sam said, "Wanna bet?" an jokingly ran out of his office.
